discussion.p: The description of codecvt<>::do_out and do_in mentions a symbol "do_convert" which is not defined in the standard. This is a leftover from an edit, and should be "do_in and do_out".

resolution.p: In , paragraph 3, change "do_convert" to "do_in or do_out". Also, in , change "do_convert()" to "do_in or do_out".
